description.value:
Consumable (Ammunition)

As an action, you can apply this calibrator to one vibroweapon or pair of handwraps within 5 feet, granting it a +3 bonus to attack rolls and dealing an additional [[/r 1d10]] damage for 1 minute. This bonus is in addition to any bonuses granted by the weapon. Additionally, if the weapon is not enhanced, it becomes enhanced for the duration.

Â 

Oscillation calibrator

As an action, you can apply this calibrator to one vibroweapon or pair of handwraps within 5 feet, granting it a +1 bonus to damage rolls for 1 minute. This bonus is in addition to any bonuses granted by the weapon.
